about.blurb: I love Christmas, apple-bobbing, and entrepreneurship.
I like to par-tay. And write. Not usually at the same time.
I code like a ninja in boxer shorts with a bag of lays in the dark of my room.
If everything was designed by Epic, the world would be a better place.
I'm European. And sort of tall. And a little metro. But mostly I'm just awesome, because my name is Mats.
Nothing is dangerous for me. I was a boy scout. And I, like Lucas, love to par-tay.
I talk to computers. I'm a computer whisperer. And shouter. And occasionally curser. And I don't have a picture. :'(
